name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth
description: An exploration of the ancient languages and scripts used in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth, including Elvish, Dwarvish, and the Black Speech. This course delves into the linguistic structures, phonetics, and writing systems of these fictional languages, as well as their cultural significance within the context of Middle-earth lore. Students will engage in reading and translating texts written in these languages, gaining a deeper appreciation for Tolkien's world-building and linguistic creativity.

lessons.name: Introduction to Middle-earth Languages
lessons.description: Overview of the ancient languages and scripts used in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Elvish Languages
lessons.description: Study of the Elvish languages, including Sindarin and Quenya.

lessons.name: Dwarvish and Black Speech
lessons.description: Study of the Dwarvish language (Khuzdul) and the Black Speech of Mordor.

lessons.description: Study of the diplomatic interactions between Wizards and Elves in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Men and Dwarves

name: The War of the Ring: A Case Study in Middle-earth Diplomacy

lessons.name: Introduction to the War of the Ring
lessons.description: Overview of the War of the Ring and its significance in Middle-earth history.

lessons.description: Study of the alliances and conflicts between different species during the War of the Ring.

name: The War of the Ring: A Case Study in Middle-earth Diplomacy
description: An in-depth analysis of the War of the Ring as a case study in inter-species diplomacy within J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth. This course explores the alliances, conflicts, and diplomatic strategies employed by the various factions during this pivotal event in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: Introduction to the War of the Ring
lessons.description: Overview of the War of the Ring and its significance in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: Alliances and Conflicts
lessons.description: Study of the alliances and conflicts between different species during the War of the Ring.

lessons.name: Diplomatic Strategies
lessons.description: Analysis of the diplomatic strategies employed by different factions during the War of the Ring.

name: The Role of Leadership in Middle-earth Diplomacy
description: An examination of the role of leadership in shaping diplomatic interactions and outcomes in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth. This course explores the leadership styles and decisions of key figures such as Gandalf, Elrond, Aragorn, and others, and how their actions influenced the course of events in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Introduction to Leadership in Middle-earth
lessons.description: Overview of the role of leadership in shaping diplomatic interactions in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Gandalf and Elrond: Wise Leadership
lessons.description: Study of the leadership styles and decisions of Gandalf and Elrond in Middle-earth diplomacy.

lessons.name: Aragorn: The Reluctant King
lessons.description: Analysis of Aragorn's leadership style and its impact on Middle-earth diplomacy.
